Description: Limestone stela of Makaria Martha; top in the form of a cross patée; incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: See Schaten 2005, nn. 9 and 21; Cf. Boud'hors and Calament 2004, 462, no. 1, fig. 7.
Bibliographic references: Badawy 1978 / Coptic art and archaeology (3.217, p.221)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
